name: SuiCats
description:
Hop onto the cat blanket and make yourself at home! SuiCats is a sweet and cheerful game about cats that love to cuddle up to each other. Arrange the cats on the blanket to fit as many as you can! Create amazing cat cascades by pairing up two identical cats. You'll be rewarded with bonus points for quickly matching the cats. Can you create the highest-tier cat?

Key Features:

🐾 Match two identical cats to get a higher-tier cat. The higher the cat's tier, the more fun it becomes!

🎮 Utilize gravity physics, plan your strategy, and have creative fun as you create cat cascades and earn points. Show how clever you are in this fast-paced and logical challenge!

😸 Smiles All Around: Our game is full of humorous moments and adorable cats. Meow!

🧩 Creativity and Strategy: It's not just a logic game; it's also a creative activity. Develop your own strategies and experiment with matching the cats.

Join this magical adventure full of cats and colorful cascades. Invite your friends and set high scores together!
